title: Sugar Sweet - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Awkward Protagonist   Cooking   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Early Romance   Fantasy World   Heartwarming   Magic
author: Shichigatsu Itsuka   七月五日
description:
“Please deliver this pendant to my friend.”

Following a map to a town called Akebi that his dead grandmother left together with her will, Sui goes into the forest in search of his grandmother’s friend and inevitably gets lost. In the forest he meets a mysterious and beautiful young man named Red whose eyes are covered with a piece of cloth.

This is a boy-meets-boy fantasy where secrets, memories and delicious sweets are woven together. 
>
